doc.field: Oral history transcript New York State School of Industrial Labor Relations at Cornell University; Ad hoc arbitrations (1977-1985); New York State PERB correspondence, memos and decisions (1982-1984); National Railroad Adjustment Board notes, memos awards and decisions (1965-1985); Agreements and arbitrations for railroad employee unions
